user-errors.latitude: Latitude must be a number between -90 and 90
user-errors.coords: Both longitude and latitude must be present

errors.email: Email {{email}} is taken by other user
errors.not-found: The user was deleted from the other session

errors.not-found: The user is not found (was deleted previously)

password.change-q: Are you sure you want to the password?

change.title: Enter new password
change.no-password: Password must be not shorter than 6 characters, have at least a letter, an uppercase letter, a digit and a symbol

register.login: Please, enter your credentials to log in

delete.q: Do you really want to delete the drone?

errors.device-id: A drone with such machine ID already exists

drone-errors.device-id: Machine ID must consist of 12 hexadecimal numbers
drone-errors.engine-power: Engine power must be a non-negative number
drone-errors.battery-power: Battery power must be a non-negative number
drone-errors.load-capacity: Load capacity must be a non-negative number

drone-errors.no-longitude: Longitude is not set for user nor for drone
